text: Mongkol Na Songkhla (, 16 January 1941 â€“ 11 December 2020) was a Thai politician. He was the Minister of Public Health from 2006 to 2008 during the Surayud Chulanont cabinet. He was born in Bangkok. Na Songkhla died on 11 December 2020 in Bangkok from cancer, aged 79.Former health minister Mongkol dies at 79 ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Thailand Category:Thai politicians Category:People from Bangkok
title: Mongkol Na Songkhla
